reg:regulation.reg:title: Definitions Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 211/2012, November 1, 2012]

bcl:section.bcl:text: In the Credit Union Incorporation Act, the Financial Institutions Act and the Business Corporations Act, as it applies to a financial institution, officer of a corporation includes a credit officer, an employee of the corporation who has the authority to approve loans and an employee of the corporation who reports directly to the directors.
In the Financial Institutions ActÂ carry on deposit business does not include raise money through the issue of security instruments for the purpose of business other than deposit business.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Financial Institutions Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 141, section 289; Credit Union Incorporation Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 82, section 108; Business Corporations Act, S.B.C. 2002, c. 57, section 432 (2) (gg)]
